source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Building an Application with Functional Haskell
items.headline: Explore your Haskell Ecosystem with real world applications
objectives_summary: Parse command-line options using the applicative style
Use strict and lazy file I/O
Handle the various common Haskell string types

items.title: Machine Learning for Android App development Using ML Kit
items.headline: Add intelligent features to your Android apps with ML Kit
objectives_summary: Explore how machine learning is changing the world we live in.
Configure UIs with camera settings and use them in your app.
Implement text recognition and deploy it with Firebase on the cloud.

items.title: Swift 4 and iOS 11: Building a Store Front App (App Only)
items.headline: *** FREE Update to Swift 4 and iOS 11 ***  Swift iOS development: Developing eCommerce type application from scratch.
objectives_summary: Utilize Xcode to help them with iOS development
Get a good understanding, if not great, of Swift development language
Prepare themselves in getting a job as iOS developer

items.title: Build iOS Apps with Swift, Learn to Code & Be Happy!

visible_instructors.job_title: iOS Developer & Ray Wenderlich Video Team Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Avi
visible_instructors.title: Avi Gray

items.headline: Encouraging, Exciting and Insightful Lessons where we build awesome iOS Apps together with lots of laughs along the way!
objectives_summary: Learn to code from scratch using Topical Learning - all topics are covered in a fun context making it easier to memorise and master
Get started with mini-assignments that are realistic to the work environment and we'll cover them together
We'll learn theory through building apps and mini-games concentrating on what is most important to build your knowledge base

items.title: Create Cross Platform Native Mobile Applications with Fuse
items.headline: Native mobile apps with JavaScript, smooth 60fps animations, REST API, native device APIs and more!
objectives_summary: Build cross platform mobile applications with Fuse
Use Observables within Fuse applications
Create animations with Fuse

items.title: Ionic 4-5 & Wordpress, iOS/Android, Push Notification 2020
items.headline: How to create a real mobile app for android and iOS using Ionic 4/5 and  wordpress Restful API.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create a mobile app for Android and iOS
Publish the app in PlayStore and AppStore
Setup push notification with OneSignal

items.title: Learn To Build A Financial App in iOS
items.headline: Build an advance ios app using database and charts from scratch
objectives_summary: Learn to create an advance financial app along the instructor
Learn to manage views, charts and data in an iOS App
Learn the best design and development practices for iOS Programming

items.title: Build Dating/Chatting app from scratch in android
items.headline: Build your future app with us
objectives_summary: Android
Android Material
Building real one to one chat application

items.title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning for iOS and Core ML
items.headline: Introduction to machine learning for iOS App Development and the Core ML Framework
objectives_summary: Introduction to machine learning and the Core ML framework.
How to build your own custom machine learning model and integrate it into an iOS app.
Learn the fundamentals of Core ML.

items.title: Beginner Mobile App Development with Appcelerator Titanium
items.headline: Learn to develop native iPhone, Android, Blackberry, and Mobile Web apps with Open Source tools.
objectives_summary: Learn how to install Titanium Studio
Learn how to run demo application
Learn how to write Titanium mobile code

items.title: Android Jetpack Architecture Components
items.headline: Utilize Android Jetpack Architecture components to make your Android application development flexible and maintainable
objectives_summary: Get introduced to Android architecture components
Use the Data Binding library to bind data to the UI
Provide stability in your app by handling life cycles, view models, and live data

items.title: Learn Swift 3, Xcode 8 and iOS 10 Step by Step.

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.title: John Bura

items.headline: This 10 hour course will give you the fundamentals you need to furthur your career as an app developer
objectives_summary: Code in Swift 3.0
Use XCode 8
Gain fundamental concepts to make iOS 10 apps

items.title: AWS: Serverless App Development with AWS: 3-in-1
items.headline: Conquer the world of serverless application development to master production -ready and secure applications with AWS.
objectives_summary: Design and build an application based on AWS serverless services to discover AWS serverless services and their various roles
Deploy, test, and debug your application by taking up tasks from databases and retrieving them in your serverless application
Explore best practices to effectively monitor and troubleshoot Serverless applications using AWS CloudWatch

items.title: The Complete Objective-C Guide for IOS 8 and Xcode 6
items.headline: A Guide to iPhone and iPad development. A Complete Xcode 6 and IOS 8 Course with Objective-C Beginner to pro.
objectives_summary: Full understanding of Xcode and all it has to offer
Learn how to program for IOS 8 to create your own apps
Be able to support all devices and screen sizes

items.title: Flutter 2.2 & Firebase, build a complete app from scratch
items.headline: Flutter 2.2 work OS app for companies using Flutter with Firebase
objectives_summary: This Flutter course a complete guide that helps in learning and building a fully functioning Flutter application with Firebase.
Teaching how to write Clean-code and avoid Boilerplate code
This course you how to make new designs and styles for your App

items.title: Visual Studio App Center with Xamarin
items.headline: DevOps with Mobile Applications
objectives_summary: Integrate Mobile Center SDK in Mobile Apps
Build Apps via Github , Bitbucket and VSTS
Test Apps on different Online Devices
